T02D2644:247b-0: @247b mkhas pa yis ni bsam par bya //

T02D2644:247b-19: bdag nyid sems dpar bskyed nas kyang //

T02D2644:250b-7: sangs rgyas rnams ni gcig tu gyur //

T02D2644:250b-13: lag gnyis rdo rje bsdams pa las /
T02D2644:250b-14: gung mo myu gu ltar mnyam bsgreng //

T02D2644:250b-17: gung mo rin chen 'dra ba ni //
T02D2644:250b-18: dang po'i sangs rgyas yin par bshad //
T02D2644:250b-20: mya ngan med pa'i phyag rgya yin //

T02D2644:250b-25: sangs rgyas bzhi pa'i yin par bshad //

T02D2644:251a-54: bsdams las gung mo gnyis phyung ste //

T02D2644:251b-0: yon @251b tan snying po'i phyag rgya'o //
T02D2644:251b-1: lag gnyis cung zad bsnol byas nas //

T02D2644:251b-31: bsdams las gung mo gnyis phyung ste //
T02D2644:251b-32: ral gri lta bur byas pa ni //
T02D2644:251b-35: blo gros mi zad phyag rgya'o //

T02D2644:251b-37: mdzub mo rgyab nas sbyar ba ni //

T02D2644:251b-40: snying gar rdo rje rtse lnga pa dkar po bskyed la sa ma ya stvam /
T02D2644:251b-42: de nas chos kyi phyag rgya ni bde bar gshegs pa'i yum gyi ljags la /
T02D2644:251b-44: zhes bya ba dgod par bya'o //
T02D2644:251b-45: phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i ljags la badzra dzny'a na /

T02D2644:251b-47: snga ma bzhin du lce la rdo rje bsam par bya'o //
T02D2644:251b-48: de nas las kyi phyag rgya bcing bar bya ste /
T02D2644:251b-49: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos kyi phyag rgya
T02D2644:251b-50: ni sngar gyi 'byin pa'i sa bon gyi phyag rgya'o
T02D2644:251b-51: // phyung nas ji ltar phyag mtshan bsnams pa ni /
T02D2644:251b-52: phyag rgya chen po yin par shes par bya'o //
T02D2644:251b-53: de las phyag mtshan med pa ni las kyi phyag rgyar shes par bya'o //
T02D2644:252a-1: rgya la yang snying gar sna tshogs rdo rje bsams la bcing bar bya'o //
T02D2644:252a-3: bzang mo'i dpung rgyan dang 'dra ba'i phyir dang /
T02D2644:252a-4: nyo tshong mkhan gyi lag pa dang 'dra ba'i phyir ro //
T02D2644:252a-5: de nas yi ge brgya pas brtan par bya ste /
T02D2644:252a-6: badzra satva su sam gra ham badzra ratna ma nutta ram /
T02D2644:252a-9: zhes bya ba'i rdo rje'i glu blang zhing sgeg mo la sogs pa brgyad kyis mchod do //
T02D2644:252a-10: de ltar mchod pa brgyad kyis mchod nas /
T02D2644:252a-11: lag pa g-yon pas rdo rje dril bu blangs la /
T02D2644:252a-12: lag pa g-yas pas rdo rje gsor zhing /
T02D2644:252a-14: yang rdo rje rang gi snying gar stod pa'i tshul gyis 'jog cing /
T02D2644:252a-17: de ltar byas pas lus dang ngag dang sems rdo rje 'dra bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2644:252a-18: thog mtha' med pa'i sems dpa' ni //
T02D2644:252a-19: rdo rje sems dpa' dga' ba che //
T02D2644:252a-20: kun du bzang po kun bdag nyid //
T02D2644:252a-21: rdo rje bsnyems tshul bdag po'i bdag / srid pa
T02D2644:252a-22: ngo bo nyid kyis dag / ngo bo nyid kyis
T02D2644:252a-23: sring bral byas // rang bzhin dag pa'i sems dpa' mchog / srid pa mchog tu byed par 'gyur //
T02D2644:252a-24: dharm'a aa zhes bya ba ni dril bu'i sa bon no //
T02D2644:252a-25: de nas dam tshig gsum gyi glus mchod pa ni 'di yin te /
T02D2644:252a-26: aom nam mkha' las byung mtshan ldan phyir //
T02D2644:252a-27: thog ma tha ma med pa'i mchog / yum mchog shes rab pha rol phyin //
T02D2644:252a-28: bde bar gshegs pa deng grub mdzod //
T02D2644:252a-29: kun mchog dngos grub chen po ste //
T02D2644:252a-30: dbang phyug chen po lhag pa'i lha //
T02D2644:252a-31: rdo rje 'dzin pa kun gyi rgyal //
T02D2644:252a-32: mi 'gyur mchog tu bdag sgrub mdzod //
T02D2644:252a-33: nyes pa mi mnga' rtag pa khyod //
T02D2644:252a-34: 'dod chags kun gyi rjes chags pa //
T02D2644:252a-35: 'dod pa chen po dga' ba che //
T02D2644:252a-36: bcom ldan de nyid kyis grub mdzod //
T02D2644:252a-37: shin tu dag pa kun gyi mchog / gdod nas grol ba de bzhin gshegs //
T02D2644:252a-38: kun du bzang po kun bdag nyid //
T02D2644:252a-39: byang chub sems dpa' bdag grub mdzod //
T02D2644:252a-40: dngos grub chen po kun gyi mchog / dbang phyug
T02D2644:252a-41: chen po phyag rgya'i mchog / grub pa'i rdo rje
T02D2644:252a-42: cher bstod pa // rdo rje bsnyems bdag bdag mdzod cig / de nas phyag bzhi byas la /
T02D2644:252b-0: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rjer @252b bsgom mo //
T02D2644:252b-1: de nas sva bh'a wa shuddho& ham /
T02D2644:252b-2: zhes bya bas rang bzhin gyis dag par mos par byas la /
T02D2644:252b-4: zhes bya bas bdag med pa'i mnyam pa nyid kyis
T02D2644:252b-5: bcom ldan 'das yum shes rab kyi pha rol tu
T02D2644:252b-6: phyin ma la sogs pa'i lha thams cad kyi ngo
T02D2644:252b-7: bo nyid du bsam par bya'o //
T02D2644:252b-8: de nas rdo rje dbyings chen po'i yi ge brgya pa rdo rje tshig gam /
T02D2644:252b-9: yid kyis bzlas la thams cad kyang bdag yin no zhes bsgoms te /
T02D2644:252b-10: lha thams cad kyi zhal nas sngags 'byung bar bsams la bzlas pa la brtson par bya'o //
T02D2644:252b-11: de lta bu ni lha thams cad kyi bzlas par 'gyur ro //
T02D2644:252b-12: ji srid du skyo bar ma 'gyur ba de srid
T02D2644:252b-13: du bsgoms la skyo bar gyur na yang mtshan brgya
T02D2644:252b-15: mchod yon phul te phyag bzhi byas nas /
T02D2644:252b-16: phyag rgya gong nas 'byung pa de nyid dkrol nas /
T02D2644:252b-17: mngon par 'dod pa'i dngos grub kyi phyir dge ba'i rtsa ba bsngo ste /
T02D2644:252b-18: bdag gis cho ga ma tshang pa gang dag bgyis
T02D2644:252b-19: pa de bzod par mdzod cig ces gsol ba btab
T02D2644:252b-22: siddhi datt'a ya th'a nu ga / gatstsha t'am buddha bi sha yam /
T02D2644:252b-23: pu na ra ga ma na ya tstsha /
T02D2644:252b-24: zhes bya ba thams cad gshegs pa'i phyir bskul bar bya zheng badzra satva mu:/
T02D2644:252b-26: rdo rje sems dpa' phyag rgya gyen du dgrol bar bya'o //
T02D2644:252b-27: de lta bus thams cad gshegs su gsol bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2644:252b-28: ji ltar sprul pa'i dkyil 'khor lha tshogs 'khor dang
T02D2644:252b-29: bcas pa rnams ni de bzhin du yid kyis rang
T02D2644:252b-31: rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi srung pa thams cad byas te /
T02D2644:252b-32: dkyil 'khor gyi las dang glegs bam klog pa la sogs pa bya'o //
T02D2644:252b-33: de ltar dus bzhir nyin re bzhin /
T02D2644:252b-34: zla ba gcig gam zla ba drug gam dus ji
T02D2644:252b-35: srid kyi bar du bzlas par bya ste lha rnams
T02D2644:252b-36: las gnang ba thob kyi bar du'o //
T02D2644:252b-37: sngon du bsnyen pa'i cho ga'o /

T02D2644:252b-41: byang phyogs kyi cha'am gang yid dga' bar dkyil 'khor bya'o //
T02D2644:252b-42: lha khang grong khyer skyed tshal gyi //
T02D2644:252b-43: byang shar phyogs ni ji lta ba'i //
T02D2644:252b-44: sa yi cha ni yongs bzung la //
T02D2644:252b-45: cho ga bzhin du sbyar bar bya'o //
T02D2644:253a-2: gnas dang sbyang ba bya mi dgos //
T02D2644:253a-3: pus mo rked pa lte ba'am //
T02D2644:253a-4: lkog ma nub tsam sa brkos la //

T02D2644:253b-5: rdo rje can gyi dkyil 'khor bri //

T02D2644:253b-22: bdag nyid rang nyid rdo rje can //

T02D2644:253b-49: gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor dgug par bya //
T02D2644:253b-50: rdo rje khu tshur gyis bcings nas //
T02D2644:253b-51: mdzub mo mthe bong rdo rje byas //
T02D2644:254a-2: de nas rdo rje 'khor lo yi //
T02D2644:254a-3: phyag rgya dang ni sngags 'di yis //
T02D2644:254a-4: dkyil 'khor byin gyis brlab par bya //

T02D2644:254a-6: rdo rje rgyu yi las kyi ni //
T02D2644:254a-7: phyag rgya nyid ni bshad pa yin //

T02D2644:254a-9: 'og gi phyogs kyi bgegs rnams bzlog / aom badzra
T02D2644:254a-10: k'i li k'i la ya sarba bighn'am bandha h'um phat
T02D2644:254a-11: / brgya ni rtsa brgyad bzlas nas kyang //
T02D2644:254a-12: dkyil 'khor dbus dang grva bzhi ru //
T02D2644:254a-13: g-yon pas bzung ste g-yas pas gdab //
T02D2644:254a-14: seng sdeng phur bu lnga bskyed do //
T02D2644:254a-15: aom gha gha gh'a ta ya gh'a ta ya sarba dusht'an h'um phat /
T02D2644:254a-16: k'i la ya k'i la ya sarba p'a pam phat ;
T02D2644:254a-17: badzra k'i la ya badzra dha ra a'a dznya pa ya ti sv'a h'a /
T02D2644:254a-18: bdug pas bdugs te dbang bskur ro //
T02D2644:254a-19: de nas dkyil 'khor dbus su ni //
T02D2644:254a-20: dkyil 'khor yongs su brtag byas nas //
T02D2644:254a-21: tsandan gur kum la sogs pas //
T02D2644:254a-22: yum chen gyi ni gnas dag tu //

T02D2644:254a-24: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas dag dang //
T02D2644:254a-25: byang chub sems dpa'i gnas su ni //
T02D2644:254a-26: grva bzhi zlum por bya ba'o //
T02D2644:254a-27: yum mchog gi ni sngags kyis ni //
T02D2644:254a-28: lan gsum dag tu bzlas pa'o //
T02D2644:254a-29: de nas nam mkha'i phyogs nas ni //
T02D2644:254a-30: nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor bkug nas ni //
T02D2644:254a-31: gzhug nas bcing dang dbang du bya //
T02D2644:254a-32: mchod pa lnga pos legs par mchod //
T02D2644:254a-33: de nas dbang bskur bum pa la //

T02D2644:254a-35: yum mchog sngags ni brgya bzlas te //
T02D2644:254a-36: mchod yon legs par dbul bar bya //
T02D2644:254a-37: bdug pas bdugs nas me tog dor //
T02D2644:254a-38: lhag par gnas par bya ba'o //
T02D2644:254a-39: thun gsum dag tu bzlas byas nas //
T02D2644:254a-40: des ni dbang bskur bya ba'o //
T02D2644:254a-41: lhag par gnas pa'i sbyin sreg bya //
T02D2644:254a-42: de nas phyi rol phyung nas kyang //
T02D2644:254a-43: dam tshig can la gtor ma sbyin //
T02D2644:254a-44: nye reg dag kyang byas nas ni //
T02D2644:254a-45: mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad dam pa ni //
T02D2644:254a-46: lan cig bar du brjod par bya //
T02D2644:254a-47: de nas me tog la sogs dang //
T02D2644:254a-48: sgeg mo la sogs brgyad kyis mchod //
T02D2644:254a-49: slob ma lhag par gnas pa'o //
T02D2644:254a-50: re zhig dang por khrus byas la //
T02D2644:254a-51: shin tu gtsang ba'i gos gyon la //
T02D2644:254a-52: me tog thogs pa'i slob ma yis //
T02D2644:254a-53: slob dpon dag la phyag byas te //
T02D2644:254a-54: 'di skad ces ni smra bar bya //
T02D2644:254b-0: dga' @254b chen khyod bdag ston pa bas //
T02D2644:254b-1: slob dpon khyod ni dgongs su gsol //
T02D2644:254b-2: byang chub chen po'i tshul bstan pa //
T02D2644:254b-3: mgon po chen po bdag 'tshal lo //
T02D2644:254b-4: dam tshig de nyid stsal du gsol //
T02D2644:254b-5: sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te //
T02D2644:254b-6: skyabs gsum dag ni bdag la stsol //
T02D2644:254b-7: thar pa chen po'i grong mchog tu //
T02D2644:254b-8: mgon po bdag ni 'jug par bgyi'o //
T02D2644:254b-9: de nas sdig pa bshags pa byed du bcug ste /
T02D2644:254b-10: rtog pa rnams ni shin tu bsdus nas ni //
T02D2644:254b-11: shin tu bsam pa bzang po ldan pas nyon //
T02D2644:254b-12: brjed ngas blo la rdo rje sems dpa' sogs //
T02D2644:254b-13: bde bar gshegs pa rnams kyis byin mi rlob//
T02D2644:254b-14: dbang med bdag gis mi dge bgyis pa dang //
T02D2644:254b-15: rjes su yi rang yang na bgyid rtsal gang //
T02D2644:254b-16: de dag thams cad byang chub mchog tu ni //
T02D2644:254b-17: spyan sngar de lta ma lus so sor bshags //
T02D2644:254b-18: bde bar gshegs pa sras kyi lha rnams dang //
T02D2644:254b-19: rgya chen 'gro ba ma lus pa yi don //
T02D2644:254b-20: sgrub par byed dang de las gzhan la'ang //
T02D2644:254b-21: rtag tu bdag ni rjes su yi rang ngo //
T02D2644:254b-22: thugs rjes khyab pa'i thugs dang ldan gyur cig / blo gros sdig bral gti mug tshogs kun bcom //
T02D2644:254b-23: ma lus rigs kyi padma'i nang bzhugs pa //
T02D2644:254b-24: bde bar gshegs pa rnams la skyabs su mchi //
T02D2644:254b-25: smra bsam brjod med shes rab pha rol phyin //
T02D2644:254b-26: ma skyes mi 'gag nam mkha'i ngo bo nyid //
T02D2644:254b-27: so so rang rig ye shes spyod yul ba //
T02D2644:254b-28: dus gsum rgyal ba'i yum la skyabs su mchi //
T02D2644:254b-29: blo mchog rnams kyi kun dga' rab dang //
T02D2644:254b-30: dman pas 'jigs pa nyid kyi rgyal byed tshal //
T02D2644:254b-31: srid pa'i 'byor pa zil gyis gnon pa'i mchog / gsung mchog chos la bdag ni skyabs su mchi //
T02D2644:254b-32: 'dod chags la sogs sbrul gyi dug bcom zhing //
T02D2644:254b-33: blo gros rnam rgyal thugs rje cher ldan pa'i //
T02D2644:254b-34: brtul zhugs bzang po'i tshogs la skyabs su mchi //
T02D2644:254b-35: srid dang bral ba rnams la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2644:254b-36: rgyu yi rjes la bdag po'i yul bdag nyid //
T02D2644:254b-37: 'bras bu'i stobs kyis dgra las rgyal gyur pa'i //
T02D2644:254b-38: snying rje'i rtsa ba zug cing yang dag rtogs //
T02D2644:254b-39: mnyam med byang chub yang dag gzung bar bgyi //
T02D2644:254b-40: sems can rnams ni yongs su smin pa 'am //
T02D2644:254b-41: yang na yongs su bskyab par bya ba'am //
T02D2644:255a-0: @255a * // rang gi sems ni dag par bya ba'i phyir //
T02D2644:255a-1: 'di dag thams cad rtsva sog bzhin du btang //
T02D2644:255a-2: de bzhin tshul khrims bzod dang brtson 'grus dang //
T02D2644:255a-3: bsam gtan shes rab bla na med pa ni //
T02D2644:255a-4: bdag dang gzhan rnams dag par bya ba'i phyir //
T02D2644:255a-5: skad cig re re zhing ni bsgom par bgyi //
T02D2644:255a-6: bde bar gshegs pa sngags la mkhas pa yi //
T02D2644:255a-7: chos rgyal rtag tu lhun gyis grub pa ni //
T02D2644:255a-8: 'gro ba 'di yis thob par bya ba'i phyir //
T02D2644:255a-9: khyad par gnas la bdag ni gnas par bgyi //
T02D2644:255a-11: bdag gis de skad brjod pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis //
T02D2644:255a-12: bdag gis lus thams cad yongs su gtang bar bgyi'o //
T02D2644:255a-13: bdag gis sems can thams cad la mnyam pa'i sems bskyed par bgyi'o //
T02D2644:255a-14: bdag gis sems can thams cad theg pa thams cad dang /
T02D2644:255a-15: thabs kyi bye brag thams cad kyis btul nas mi
T02D2644:255a-16: gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings la rab
T02D2644:255a-18: bdag gis sems can thams cad mya ngan 'das kyang
T02D2644:255a-19: sems can 'ga' yang mya ngan las 'das pa med
T02D2644:255a-20: do zhes sems bskyed par bgyi'o //
T02D2644:255a-21: bdag gis chos thams cad skye ba med pa nyid du rjes su rtogs par bgyi'o //
T02D2644:255a-22: bdag gis ma yengs pa'i sems dang /
T02D2644:255a-23: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug la bslab par bgyi'o //
T02D2644:255a-24: bdag gis ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi rgyal po
T02D2644:255a-25: thob par bgyi ste sems can thams cad byang chub
T02D2644:255a-26: rnam pa gsum la dgod par bgyi'o //
T02D2644:255a-27: bdag gis theg pa gcig gi tshul du gnas par yang rtogs par bgyi'o //
T02D2644:255a-28: bdag gis byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu
T02D2644:255a-29: rtsa bdun la gnas pa so sor rtogs par bya
T02D2644:255a-31: bdag gis stobs bcu dang mi 'jigs pa dang so
T02D2644:255a-32: so yang dag par rig pa dang sangs rgyas kyi
T02D2644:255a-33: chos ma 'dres pa rnams so sor rtogs par bya
T02D2644:255a-34: ba'i phyir mngon par brtson par bgyi'o //
T02D2644:255a-35: de bzhin du bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
T02D2644:255a-36: lus pa'i bar la mngon par gnas par bya ba'i
T02D2644:255a-37: phyir mngon par bsgrub par bgyi'o //
T02D2644:255a-38: 'di nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang
T02D2644:255a-39: chub kyi byang chub chen po'i sems bskyed pa rdo
T02D2644:255a-41: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yab dang /
T02D2644:255b-0: de bzhin gshegs @255b pa thams cad kyi bka' bzhin byed pa dang /
T02D2644:255b-1: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sras kyi thu bo ste /
T02D2644:255b-2: 'di nyid bcom ldan 'das kun du bzang po'o //
T02D2644:255b-3: de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba ji lta ba bzhin du
T02D2644:255b-4: yang dag par rdzogs par byas pa'i stobs kyis bdag
T02D2644:255b-5: sems bskyad pa 'di la gnas pas kun du bzang
T02D2644:255b-6: po'i spyod pa zhes bya ba sgo mtha' yas pa
T02D2644:255b-7: la gnas pa / mtha' med par 'gyur ba rdzogs
T02D2644:255b-8: par byas nas gdul bya 'gro ba'i tshogs ma lus
T02D2644:255b-9: pa rnams la spyod pa rab tu dbye ba'i sgo
T02D2644:255b-10: mang po bstan pas yang dag par mgu bar bya
T02D2644:255b-11: la gnas pa / ba dang / yang dag par dga' bar bya ba dang /
T02D2644:255b-12: yang dag par gzengs bstod pa la nges par sbyar bar bgyi'o //
T02D2644:255b-13: de nas sa ma ya aa zhes bzlas pas /
T02D2644:255b-14: slob ma'i snying gar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bskyed la /
T02D2644:255b-15: de'i steng du rdo rje rtse lnga pa dkar po de la bzhag la /
T02D2644:255b-16: su ra ta sa ma ya stvam ho badzra siddha ya th'a su kham /
T02D2644:255b-17: zhes bya ba'i snying po yang snying gar bzlas la /
T02D2644:255b-18: spyi bor spos chus brlan pa'am gsher ba'i lag pa bzhag la /
T02D2644:255b-19: rdo rje sems dpa' bzlas shing rdo rjer bsam par bya'o //
T02D2644:255b-20: dpral ba dang lkog ma dang spyi bor tram hr'i
T02D2644:255b-21: dang kam las rdo rje dang rin po che dang
T02D2644:255b-22: padma dang sna tshogs rdo rjer bsams la /
T02D2644:255b-26: badzra karma zhes zlos shing snying ga la sogs par byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
T02D2644:255b-27: de nas aa shvadtha la sogs pa'i so shing sor
T02D2644:255b-28: bcu gnyis pa'i tshad la rtse mor me tog bcings
T02D2644:255b-29: la / rdo rje bzhad pas bzlas la sbyin no //
T02D2644:255b-30: de nas shar ram byang du bltas te rtse mo nyid nas bca' bar bya'o //
T02D2644:255b-31: de nas kun sha sar pa la rdo rje gnon po bzlas te byin la /
T02D2644:255b-32: 'di ni stan du gding zhing sngas su gyis la nyol cig cas bsgo'o //
T02D2644:255b-33: de nas dpung pa g-yon par ni //
T02D2644:255b-34: rdo rje srung ba bzlas pa yi //
T02D2644:255b-35: srung skud mdud pa gsum ldan pa //
T02D2644:255b-36: bdag nyid kyis ni legs par bcing //
T02D2644:255b-37: de nas zab mo rgya che ba'i //
T02D2644:255b-38: chos ni ci nus par bstan pas /
T02D2644:255b-39: thams cad la gzengs bstod par byas nas /
T02D2644:255b-40: bzhin bzangs rnams longs shig nang par dkyil 'khor chen po mthong bar 'gyur zhes bsgo'o //
T02D2644:255b-41: lhag par gnas pa'i cho ga'o /
T02D2644:255b-43: // / de nas nyi ma 'char ka ru //
T02D2644:255b-45: de nas thig ni gdab par bya'o //
T02D2644:255b-46: dang por tshon rtsi sngon po dang //
T02D2644:256a-0: @256a * // ser po dang ni dmar po dang //
T02D2644:256a-1: ljang gu dkar po dag la ni //
T02D2644:256a-2: dri zhim tshon gyis so sor bsgyur //
T02D2644:256a-3: go rims kyis ni bzhag pa la //
T02D2644:256a-4: de la h'um tram hr'i: aa: aom //
T02D2644:256a-5: rang gi sa bon der dgod do //
T02D2644:256a-6: d'ipta drishta aam ku sha dza:/
T02D2644:256a-7: mig gnyis dag tu rab dgod do //
T02D2644:256a-8: rab tu g-yo zhing 'bar ba'i mig / mig gi rdzi ma 'dren pa ni //
T02D2644:256a-9: zhes bya ba'i 'bar ba'i lta bas mi bskyod pa la sogs bskul zhing /
T02D2644:256a-10: bcom ldan 'das yum chen mo'i dkyil 'khor thig gdab
T02D2644:256a-11: par bya ba'i phyir rdo rje'i thig gdab pa gsol
T02D2644:256a-12: cig ces bgyi bas kyang bskul bar bya'o //
T02D2644:256a-13: de nas rang gi sa bon gyi 'od kyis bskul
T02D2644:256a-14: bas mi bskyod pa la sogs pas btang ba'i srad
T02D2644:256a-15: bu 'bar ba'i lcags kyus bkug ste /
T02D2644:256a-16: rang gi lag na gnas ba'i srad bu de gang bar byas pa la /
T02D2644:256a-17: aa nyo n+ya aa nu ga ta sarba dharm'a pa ra spa ra aa nu pra bishta /
T02D2644:256a-18: sarba dharm'a: aom aatr'anta aa nu pra bishta sarba dharm'a: dhi /
T02D2644:256a-20: bsgril nas mig g-yas dang g-yon du /
T02D2644:256a-21: ma dang ta las nyi ma dang zla ba bskyed la /
T02D2644:256a-23: zhes bya bas brtan par byas la /
T02D2644:256a-24: srad bu de dris byugs pa'i rin po che'i snod du bzhag la /
T02D2644:256a-25: dri dang me tog dang bdug spos kyis mchod do //
T02D2644:256a-26: aom badzra sa ma ya s'u tram m'a ti kra ma h'um /
T02D2644:256a-27: zhes rdo rje bsdams pas bzung ste /
T02D2644:256a-28: lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzla bar bya'o //
T02D2644:256a-29: de nas dris nye bar byugs la bar snang la
T02D2644:256a-30: bzhugs pa'i rigs thams cad la mchod yon phul te
T02D2644:256a-31: / me tog ma la sogs pa lnga dang /
T02D2644:256a-32: sgeg mo la sogs pa brgyad kyis mchod la phyag byas la /
T02D2644:256a-33: dkyil 'khor gyi sa bzhi brtag par bya'o //
T02D2644:256a-34: de la re zhig sngags bzlas pa'i srad bu mtha'
T02D2644:256a-35: ma dkar po dang ldan pa spangs la yid kyis
T02D2644:256a-36: badzra dh'a tu / zhes bya bas rdo rje'i tshig gis bzlas la /
T02D2644:256a-37: rnam par snang mdzad du gyur par byas nas /
T02D2644:256a-39: zhes brjod pas sgrub pa'i grogs mchog rang gi snying
T02D2644:256a-40: ga nas rdo rje las kyi gzugs su sprul bar
T02D2644:256a-41: bya'o ; / de nas srad bu de g-yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyis bzung la /
T02D2644:256a-42: dza: zhes bya bas sgrub pa'i grogs mchog rdo rje
T02D2644:256a-43: las kyi gzugs can gyi lag tu srad bu gtad
T02D2644:256a-44: la phyogs thams cad mnyam pa nyid bsgom zhing /
T02D2644:256a-45: shar phyogs su bltas te rdo rje srad bu gdab par bya'o //
T02D2644:256b-0: yang slob dpon lhor @256b 'dug la byang du bltas te /
T02D2644:256b-2: de nas me'i phyogs kyi char gnas la byang du bltas te /
T02D2644:256b-3: phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi shar du thig gdab par bya'o //
T02D2644:256b-4: rlung gi phyogs su gnas pa la lho'i phyogs su bltas te nub kyi thig gdab par bya'o //
T02D2644:256b-5: de nyid du 'dug ste byang gi thig gdab bar bya'o //
T02D2644:256b-6: yang me'i phyogs su 'dug ste lho phyogs su thig gdab par bya'o //
T02D2644:256b-7: kha khyer gyi thig kyang gdab par bya'o //
T02D2644:256b-8: yang me'i mtshams su gnas te rlung gi phyogs kyi mtshams kyi thig gdab pa dang /
T02D2644:256b-9: yang bden bral gyi mtshams su gnas te dbang ldan gyi mtshams kyi bar gyi theg gdab par bya'o //
T02D2644:256b-10: slob dpon grogs mchog gnyi ga ni skor phyogs su 'gro bar bya'o //
T02D2644:256b-11: de la sgo ni 'khor lo'i brgyad cha'o //
T02D2644:256b-12: sgo khyud ni sgo'i tshad kyi phyed do //
T02D2644:256b-13: kha khyer ni sgo'i phyed do //
T02D2644:256b-14: tshon sna lnga'i sa ni kha khyer gyi phyed do //
T02D2644:256b-15: rta babs ni sgo'i sum 'gyur du bya'o //
T02D2644:256b-16: da ni lung las 'byung ba'i thig gdab ste //
T02D2644:256b-17: gsar ba las ni bkal nas kyang //
T02D2644:256b-18: tshad mthun par ni mdzes pa yis //
T02D2644:256b-19: thig ni mkhas pas ci nus kyis //
T02D2644:256b-20: dkyil 'khor gyi ni thig gdab bo //
T02D2644:256b-21: dus gsum bde gshegs thams cad kyi //
T02D2644:256b-22: yum gyur dam pa'i dkyil 'khor ni //
T02D2644:256b-23: thig bzhi btab pas dkyil 'khor dgu ;
T02D2644:256b-24: / dkyil 'khor dgu yi dkyil du ni //
T02D2644:256b-25: bde gshegs yum du gyur pa dgod //
T02D2644:256b-26: dung ltar sku mdog dkar ba la //
T02D2644:256b-27: g-yas ba rin chen mchog sbyin zhing //
T02D2644:256b-28: g-yon ba glegs bam 'dzin pa de //
T02D2644:256b-29: seng ge la gnas padma'i gang na //
T02D2644:256b-30: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dag la ni //
T02D2644:256b-31: sbyin ba tshul khrims bzod pa dang //
T02D2644:256b-32: bsam gtan la sogs 'khor gyis bsgor //
T02D2644:256b-33: phyi yi le'u tshe brgyad po la //
T02D2644:256b-34: phyogs bcu'i bde bar gshegs pa bcu //
T02D2644:256b-35: so so'i 'khor gyis bskor ba ni //
T02D2644:256b-36: seng ge la gnas padma'i gdan //
T02D2644:256b-37: de steng zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la //
T02D2644:256b-38: go rims bzhin du dgod par bya //
T02D2644:256b-39: phyogs bzhi'i zla gam bzhi'o la //
T02D2644:256b-40: sems dpa'i rdo rje la sogs ni //
T02D2644:256b-41: bdag nas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la //
T02D2644:256b-42: go rims bzhin du dgod par bya //
T02D2644:256b-43: de yang phyi rim dag tu ni //
T02D2644:256b-46: chog shes pas bri bar bya //
T02D2644:257a-2: grva bzhi phyogs bzhi dag tu ni //
T02D2644:257a-3: l'a se la sogs lha mo brgyad //
T02D2644:257a-4: pad gnas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la //
T02D2644:257a-5: legs pa dag tu bri bar bya //
T02D2644:257a-6: lha yi snam bu dgod bya ba //
T02D2644:257a-7: bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid kyi //
T02D2644:257a-8: sangs rgyas stong du bzhis mtshang //
T02D2644:257a-9: pad gnas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la //
T02D2644:257a-10: rang rang mtshan ma bsnams pa bri //
T02D2644:257a-11: sgo khyud bzhi po dag la yang //
T02D2644:257a-12: sgo ba bzhi po bri bar bya //
T02D2644:257a-13: rta babs bzhis ni mdzes byas la //
T02D2644:257a-14: dar dang me tog phreng bas brgyan //
T02D2644:257a-15: grva bzhi phyogs bzhi thams cad dang //
T02D2644:257a-16: sgo khyud kyi ni nang rnams su //
T02D2644:257a-17: rdo rje rin chen spras par ni//
T02D2644:257a-18: dkyil 'khor phyi rim bri bar bya //
T02D2644:257a-19: de ltar dkyil 'khor legs bris nas //
T02D2644:257a-20: dang por bdag nyid 'jug par bya //
T02D2644:257a-21: de nas slob ma gzhug par bya //
T02D2644:257a-23: gal ta bgegs byung na ni /
T02D2644:257a-24: stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin mngon du byas nas /
T02D2644:257a-25: de 'og aa las rnam par snang mdzad du gyur
T02D2644:257a-26: nas rgyud las bshad pa'i rnam par snang mdzad kyi
T02D2644:257a-27: skur yang nges par byas nas /
T02D2644:257a-28: ham las 'phags pa mi g-yo ba thugs ka nas phyung ste /
T02D2644:257a-29: badzra bandha zhes yid la brjod la /
T02D2644:257a-30: phyi'i dkyil 'khor du rlung gi phyogs su dri'i thig
T02D2644:257a-31: le bdun byas te thig le re re zhing yang
T02D2644:257a-32: re re'i nang du chud bar byas la dbus ma
T02D2644:257a-33: dang mtha' ma yang thig le bdun dang ldan par
T02D2644:257a-34: byas te thig le bdun po de dag kyang rlung
T02D2644:257a-35: lha bdun po ri dags la zhon pa /
T02D2644:257a-36: mdog nag po 'phags pa mi g-yo bas zhags pas kun nas bcings par bsams la /
T02D2644:257a-37: de rnams kyi dbus ma gcig ni gtso bo yin la /
T02D2644:257a-38: lhag ma drug ni 'khor yin pas /
T02D2644:257a-39: kun nas bskor bar bsam pa'o //
T02D2644:257a-40: de nas kham phor aa las ri rab tu bsams la /
T02D2644:257a-41: de'i steng du aa nyid las dbang chen gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du rdo rjes g-yogs la /
T02D2644:257a-42: dbus rdo rje rtse lnga pa /
T02D2644:257a-43: yi ge h'um gi sa bon las byung ba /
T02D2644:257a-44: mtshams rnams su mdung rtse rnams bsams la /
T02D2644:257a-45: de bzhin du badzra bandha zhes brjod do //
T02D2644:257a-46: de kham phor nges ji skad bshad pa'i thig le bdun dag par bya'o //
T02D2644:257a-47: de nas kham phor ri rab kyi steng du aom
T02D2644:257a-48: las bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad bsams te
T02D2644:257a-49: / 'phags pa mi g-yo ba yang bcom ldan 'das
T02D2644:257a-50: kyi spyan sngar g-yon pa brkyang bas ri rab bzung
T02D2644:257b-0: nas ral gri dang @257b zhags bas rlung lha rnams
T02D2644:257b-1: la sdigs mdzub mdzad par bsams te /
T02D2644:257b-2: de lta bus ni rlung thams cad bcing bar byas par 'gyur ro //
T02D2644:257b-3: de nas dkyil 'khor dbus na gnas pa'i phur bu h'um bzhis bton la /
T02D2644:257b-4: 'og nas bshad pa'i tshon sna lngas bu ga bkang la mnyam par gzhag go //
T02D2644:257b-5: de nas hri zhes bya bas mig g-yas dang g-yon du nyi ma dang zla ba bskyed la /
T02D2644:257b-6: khro bo'i lta bas kun du bltas la sgo rnams dbye'o //
T02D2644:257b-7: de nas tshon rtsi byin gyis brlab par bya ste /
T02D2644:257b-8: aom badzra tsi tra sa ma ye h'um /
T02D2644:257b-9: zhes bya ba 'di phyag rgya dang ldan pas tshon
T02D2644:257b-10: rtsi thams cad la lan bdun gyi bar du bzlas
T02D2644:257b-11: na rdo rje'i rang bzhin du 'gyur ro zhes bcom
T02D2644:257b-12: ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis gsungs so //
T02D2644:257b-13: phyag rgya gnyis las ni mdzub mo mnyam par sbyar
T02D2644:257b-14: bar byas nas tshon rtsi thams cad ni 'bar ba'i
T02D2644:257b-15: lta bas dgug par bya hri zhes bya ba dang
T02D2644:257b-16: / rdo rje nyi ma khro bo'i dam tshig gi
T02D2644:257b-17: phyag rgya dang ldan pa g-yon pa'i rdo rje khu
T02D2644:257b-18: tshur gyi mthar sbyar bar bya'o //
T02D2644:257b-19: aom badzra tsi tra sa ma ya h'um /
T02D2644:257b-20: zhes zlos shing dgye bar bya'o //
T02D2644:257b-21: phyogs bzhir yang spos snod bzhi dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa klog tu gzhug go //
T02D2644:257b-22: de nas dbus su 'dug nas ni //
T02D2644:257b-23: rdo rje slob dpon mnyam gzhag pas //
T02D2644:257b-24: rdo rje sgo ni rnam bzhi po //
T02D2644:257b-25: yid kyis su ni dbye bar bya//
T02D2644:257b-26: aom badzrodgha ta sa ma ya pra be sha h'um /
T02D2644:257b-27: rdo rje mdzub mo yang dag par //
T02D2644:257b-28: sbyar la bkan te bsdams nas su //
T02D2644:257b-29: rab tu khros nas dbye ba ni //
T02D2644:257b-30: sgo dbye ba yi mchog yin no //
T02D2644:257b-31: de nas rin po che las byas pa'i bum pa
T02D2644:257b-32: rtsa ba mi gang pa gsus pa che ba mgrin
T02D2644:257b-37: mu tig dang padma r'a ga ste rin po che thams cad dang /
T02D2644:257b-42: shve te aa pa ra tsi ta ste sman thams cad dang /
T02D2644:257b-47: ma sha ste 'bru thams cad dang spos chu dri
T02D2644:257b-48: zhim pa dang me tog dri zhim pas yongs su
T02D2644:257b-49: bkang la dris kun du byugs pa'i me tog gi
T02D2644:257b-51: mgul pa ras dkar po bzang pos brgyan pa 'dab
T02D2644:257b-52: ma dang 'bras bu dri zhim pos kha brgyan pa
T02D2644:257b-53: dang / badzra dh'a tu pradznye ma h'a pradznye h'um /
T02D2644:257b-54: zhes lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzla bar bya'o //
T02D2644:258a-1: dam dpag tu med pa'am bcu las nyung bar mi bya'o //
T02D2644:258a-2: ras zung brgya'am stong ngam lha bshos dang mar me
T02D2644:258a-3: yang brgya'am stong ngam bdug spos brgya'am stong ngam bcu
T02D2644:258a-5: glang po che 'am rta la sogs pa'i tshogs kyang dgod do //
T02D2644:258a-16: ti mi la brdung ba ste de dag kyang dbul bar bya'o //
T02D2644:258a-17: de nas dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams mngon sum lta bur bsams la /
T02D2644:258a-18: phyag bzhi sngon du 'gro bas me tog la sogs pas yang dag par mchod la /
T02D2644:258a-19: sdom pa gzung ba la sogs pa byas pa'i rjes la bdag nyid 'jug par bya'o //
T02D2644:258a-21: de nyid kyis ni rdo rje gzung //
T02D2644:258a-22: chos kyi dril bu dkrol bar bya //
T02D2644:258a-23: dam tshig gi ni phyag rgya cher //
T02D2644:258a-24: byin gyis brlabs la snying po bzla //
T02D2644:258a-25: zhes bya ba'i sngar bshad pa'i cho ga byas la
T02D2644:258a-26: yi ge brgya pa brjod la mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad
T02D2644:258a-28: dpag med shes rab pha rol phyin //
T02D2644:258a-29: sdig med rnams kyi chos sku gang //
T02D2644:258a-30: skyon rnams thams cad med gzigs mnga' //
T02D2644:258a-31: rnam rtog mi mnga' khyod la 'dud //
T02D2644:258a-32: gang gi yang dag nyid du khyod //
T02D2644:258a-33: nam mkha' bzhin du gos pa med //
T02D2644:258a-34: spros med yi ge med mthong na //
T02D2644:258a-35: des ni de bzhin gshegs pa mthong //
T02D2644:258a-36: 'phags pa dam pa rnams dang ni //
T02D2644:258a-37: yon tan phyug mo khyod dang ni //
T02D2644:258a-38: sangs rgyas 'gro ba'i bla ma dang //
T02D2644:258a-39: khyad par ma mthong zla 'od bzhin //
T02D2644:258a-40: gus byas snying rje'i bdag nyid can //
T02D2644:258a-42: khyod la brten bgyis nges par ni //
T02D2644:258a-43: bdag nyid chen po mnyam med thob //
T02D2644:258a-44: don yod gzigs ma gang yin ni //
T02D2644:258a-45: bsam pa dag pas lan 'ga' yang //
T02D2644:258a-46: tshul bzhin khyed la lta bgyid pa //
T02D2644:258a-47: des kyang nges par grub pa thob //
T02D2644:258a-48: khyod ni dpa' mo gzhan don la //
T02D2644:258a-49: dga' ba'i bdag nyid thams cad ni //
T02D2644:258a-50: gso mdzad skyed par mdzad pa ste //
T02D2644:258a-51: byams shing gcugs pa'i yum lags so //
T02D2644:258a-52: dge ba gang slong khyod kyi sras //
T02D2644:258a-53: sangs rgyas 'jig rten bla ma dang //
T02D2644:258a-54: thugs rje can lags de slad khyod //
T02D2644:258b-0: sems can kun gyi phyi mo @258b lags //
T02D2644:258b-1: ma smang skar ma rnams kyis ni //
T02D2644:258b-2: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor mdzes bzhin du //
T02D2644:258b-3: mi dmigs pha rol phyin kun gyis //
T02D2644:258b-4: khyod ni rab tu bskor ba lags //
T02D2644:258b-5: khyod ni nyag ma gcig lags kyang //
T02D2644:258b-6: de bzhin gshegs pas de dang der //
T02D2644:258b-7: skye bo 'dul ba'i rten mdzad nas //
T02D2644:258b-8: sna tshogs mtshan gyis rnam snang bstod //
T02D2644:258b-9: nyi ma'i 'od dang mjal gyur na //
T02D2644:258b-10: zil pa'i chu thigs ji bzhin du //
T02D2644:258b-11: khyod dang mjal ba dag rnams kyi //
T02D2644:258b-13: khyod nyid skrag pa skyed pa ste //
T02D2644:258b-14: byis pa rnams la 'jigs par gda' //
T02D2644:258b-15: yang dag dbugs 'byin skyed pa ste ;
T02D2644:258b-16: / mkhas pa rnams la zhi bar gda' //
T02D2644:258b-17: gang la mgon khyod dbye ba ste //
T02D2644:258b-18: khyod la mngon du chags mi mnga' //
T02D2644:258b-19: gzhan la 'dod chags zhe sdang dang //
T02D2644:258b-20: ji lta bur ni 'byung gyur yum //
T02D2644:258b-21: khyod ni gang nas mi byon te //
T02D2644:258b-22: gang du bzhud par 'gyur ma lags //
T02D2644:258b-23: gang khyod de ltar mi mthong zhing //
T02D2644:258b-24: yang dag nyid du rtogs 'gyur ba //
T02D2644:258b-26: deng 'dir ngo mtshar shin tu che //
T02D2644:258b-27: khyod mthong na ni mchi 'gyur te //
T02D2644:258b-28: ma mthong na yang mchi bar 'gyur //
T02D2644:258b-29: khyod mthong na ni grol 'gyur te //
T02D2644:258b-30: ma mthong na yang grol bar 'gyur //
T02D2644:258b-31: kye ma ngo mtshar skyed mdzad ma //
T02D2644:258b-32: zab mo lags so grags ldan ma //
T02D2644:258b-33: snang yang snang ba ma lags ma //
T02D2644:258b-34: shin tu rtogs dka' sgyu ma bzhin //
T02D2644:258b-35: sangs rgyas rnams dang rang rgyal dang //
T02D2644:258b-36: nyan thos rnams la nges bstan pa'i //
T02D2644:258b-37: thar lam gcig tu khyod lags te //
T02D2644:258b-38: gzhan ma mchis par nges par lags //
T02D2644:258b-39: 'jig rten mgon po'i thugs rje yis //
T02D2644:258b-40: lus can rnams la bstan slad du //
T02D2644:258b-41: khyod mdzad mdzad pa mdzad ma lags //
T02D2644:258b-42: mtshan nyid dang ni mtshan ma med //
T02D2644:258b-43: tshig lam kun las 'das khyod la //
T02D2644:258b-44: su zhig gis ni 'dir bstod nus //
T02D2644:258b-45: khyod ni gang la gnas mi mnga' //
T02D2644:258b-46: khyod nyid bstod bya ma lags te //
T02D2644:258b-47: de ltar phun sum tshogs mnga' ba //
T02D2644:258b-48: de 'dra'i tshig gi lam dag gis //
T02D2644:258b-49: bstod pa rnams ni shin tu bde //
T02D2644:258b-50: rdzogs pa gang zhig rtogs 'dod pa //
T02D2644:258b-51: nyan thos zhi ba 'dod pa dag / thams cad shes pa nyid 'gyur zhing //
T02D2644:258b-52: gang zhig thub mchog sras dag ni //
T02D2644:259a-2: gang zhig mchog rnams rgyal ba'i yon tan tshogs //
T02D2644:259a-3: rnam kun mkhyen pa mnyes par 'gyur ba yi //
T02D2644:259a-4: bde bar gshegs pa'i yum mchog de la ni //
T02D2644:259a-5: mkhas pa rnams kyis rtag tu 'jug par gyis / ser sna nyon mongs dag pa yi //
T02D2644:259a-6: yid bzhin nor bu dam pa 'dis //
T02D2644:259a-7: khams gsum bsam pa rdzogs mdzad pa //
T02D2644:259a-9: nyon mongs mtha' dag rab bsal bas //
T02D2644:259a-10: khams gsum pa ni thams cad kyi //
T02D2644:259a-11: sdug bsngal rnams kyis ma gos pa //
T02D2644:259a-12: mya ngan med la phyag 'tshal ba stod //
T02D2644:259a-13: gsang ba'i de nyid bsgoms pa yis //
T02D2644:259a-17: stong pa nyid la rab gnas pa //
T02D2644:259a-18: khams gsum 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal las //
T02D2644:259a-19: rab tu rgyal bar mdzad pa po //
T02D2644:259a-20: rgyal ba'i dbang po phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02D2644:259a-21: khams gsum 'khor ba la gnas pa'i //
T02D2644:259a-22: 'gro pa'i don rnams mdzad nas kyang //
T02D2644:259a-23: pad ltar skyon gyis ma gos pa //
T02D2644:259a-25: khams gsum gti mug 'khyams pa la //
T02D2644:259a-26: nyi ma lta bu'i 'khor lo yis //
T02D2644:259a-27: 'gro ba'i don rnams rab mdzad pa //
T02D2644:259a-29: nyi ma drod chen 'od lta bur //
T02D2644:259a-30: thabs kyi dam pa brnyes 'gyur pa'i //
T02D2644:259a-31: 'gro ba'i don la rab brtson pa /
T02D2644:259a-32: chan bcas shing la du ba //
T02D2644:259a-34: glang chen lta bu'i ting 'dzin gyis //
T02D2644:259a-35: khams gsum 'khor ba las sgrol ba //
T02D2644:259a-37: khams gsum sems can thams cad la //
T02D2644:259a-38: dga' ba'i dam par 'gyur ba ni //
T02D2644:259a-39: byang chub rnam gsum thob mdzad pa //
T02D2644:259a-40: dga' ba'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2644:259a-42: srid pa'i nyes pas ma gos par //
T02D2644:259a-45: 'khor rnams kyi phyag rgya bcing ba dan bstod pa
T02D2644:259a-46: ni rgyal po dang 'bangs kyi tshul yin pas mi
T02D2644:259a-47: dgos so zhes slob dpon kha cig 'chad do //
T02D2644:259a-48: de nas sgeg mo la sogs pas kyang mchod do //
T02D2644:259a-49: dngos grub thams cad grub pa'i phyir sems can thams
T02D2644:259b-0: cad kyi don @259b mdzod cig ces de bzhin gshegs
T02D2644:259b-1: pa thams cad la gsol pa gdab par bya'o //
T02D2644:259b-2: de nas grogs mchog dam pa dkyil 'khor du gzhug ste phyi rol du gtor ma sbyin par bya'o //
T02D2644:259b-3: 'bras yos bcas shing til dang bcas //
T02D2644:259b-4: 'bras chan gtor ma chu dang bcas //
T02D2644:259b-5: 'bras chan bcas shing la du ba //
T02D2644:259b-6: snum khur la sogs bza' ba rnams //
T02D2644:259b-7: zhes bya bas gtor ma'i las bya'o //
T02D2644:259b-8: de nas zhi ba'i sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad dbul lo //
T02D2644:259b-9: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la ni bdun bdun dbul te mnyes par bya'o //
T02D2644:259b-10: de nas dkyil 'khor du 'jug par bya ste dang por slob dpon bdag nyid 'jug par bya /
T02D2644:259b-11: de nas slob ma 'jug par bya ste /
T02D2644:259b-12: bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba yi //
T02D2644:259b-13: rdo rje slob dpon dka' thub che //
T02D2644:259b-14: sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir //
T02D2644:259b-15: slob ma rnams ni gzhug par bya //
T02D2644:259b-16: de nas bcom ldan 'das dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir
T02D2644:259b-17: zhugs pa la snod du gyur pa dang ma gyur
T02D2644:259b-19: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
T02D2644:259b-20: sems can kha cig sdig pa chen po mchis kyang
T02D2644:259b-21: yum chen mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
T02D2644:259b-22: ma'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir zhugs te mthong na
T02D2644:259b-23: ran song thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2644:259b-24: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'od kyis
T02D2644:259b-25: phog pa tsam gyi kyang long bas gzugs mthong ba
T02D2644:259b-26: dang 'on pas sgra thos pa la sogs pa'i bde
T02D2644:259b-27: ba rnyed na dkyil 'khor chen por zhugs pa dag
T02D2644:259b-29: de nas slob dpon gyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o //
T02D2644:259b-30: dga' chen khyod bdag ston pa bas //
T02D2644:259b-31: slob dpon khyod ni dgongs su gsol //
T02D2644:259b-32: byang chub sems dpa'i tshul brtan pa //
T02D2644:259b-33: mgon po chen po bdag 'tshal lo //
T02D2644:259b-34: dam tshig de nyid bstan du gsol //
T02D2644:259b-35: sdom pa rnams kyang bdag la stsol //
T02D2644:259b-36: de nas slob ma la stod g-yogs dang smad g-yogs bskon la phyag bzhi byed du gzhug go //
T02D2644:259b-37: lag tu me tog bskur te bshags pa nas gsol
T02D2644:259b-38: ba gdab pa'i bar du bya ste 'di skad brjod
T02D2644:259b-39: par bya'o // gtso bo bdag la sdom pa stsol //
T02D2644:259b-40: thub pa nyi ma ma lus pa //
T02D2644:259b-41: sangs rgyas rnams ni bdag la dgongs //
T02D2644:259b-42: bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba ni //
T02D2644:259b-43: slob dpon dbang du gnas pa la //
T02D2644:259b-44: sangs rgyas rol mo las byung ba //
T02D2644:260a-2: gsang ba chen por 'jug par bgyi //
T02D2644:260a-3: gsang ba thams cad bsdus par ni //
T02D2644:260a-4: slob dpon chen po bdag 'jug mdzod //
T02D2644:260a-5: mi ldog pa yi dbang bskur ba //
T02D2644:260a-6: skal pa chen po bdag la stsol //
T02D2644:260a-7: mtshan rnams kun gyis rgyas btab cing //
T02D2644:260a-8: dpe byad rnams dang yang dag ldan //
T02D2644:260a-9: sangs rgyas kyi ni yid 'ong ba //
T02D2644:260a-10: slob dpon chen po bdag la stsol //
T02D2644:260a-11: dbang bskur chen po rmad byung ba //
T02D2644:260a-12: sems can kun gyi don bgyid phyir //
T02D2644:260a-13: bdag ni rtag tu slob dpon 'gyur //
T02D2644:260a-14: slob don chen po bdag la stsol //
T02D2644:260a-16: che ge mo zhes bya ba 'di nyid ni //
T02D2644:260a-17: byang chub sems ni yongs 'dzin pa //
T02D2644:260a-18: dam tshig mchog dang gsang ba yi //
T02D2644:260a-21: gsang ba chen po rigs dag pa'i //
T02D2644:260a-22: gsang ba yongs su 'dzin par ni //
T02D2644:260a-23: bdag nyid chen po khyod 'dod dam //
T02D2644:260a-24: des kyang 'tshal lo zhes brjod par bya'o de nas /
T02D2644:260a-25: sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te //
T02D2644:260a-26: zhes bya ba la sogs pas sdom pa dbog go //
T02D2644:260a-27: sngom pa 'dzin par mi byed pa de la ni dbang bskur yang mi bya'o //
T02D2644:260a-28: 'jug pa tsam zhig byed du gzhug go / de
T02D2644:260a-29: ltar sdom pa 'dzin pa de la ni dbang por
T02D2644:260a-31: phyag rgya'i dbang dang cod pan dang /
T02D2644:260a-35: ming gi dbang bskur nas me tog la sogs pa
T02D2644:260a-36: dang sgeg mo la sogs pa brgyad kyis yang dag
T02D2644:260a-37: par mchod nas / slob dpon la yon gyi mchog phul te dbang phyi ma yang bskur bar bya'o //
T02D2644:260a-38: de nas zhi ba'i sbyin sreg gis zhi bar bya'o //
T02D2644:260a-39: tshon rtsi chu bo chen por dor ro //
T02D2644:260a-40: dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
T02D2644:260a-41: yum mchog spros pa med pa yi //
T02D2644:260a-42: sgrub thabs cung zhig sbyar ba las //
T02D2644:260a-43: kun gyis bde gshegs sku thob shog / yum gyur sgrub thabs legs sbyar ba //
T02D2644:260a-44: bsgyur bas bsod nams gang thob des //
T02D2644:260a-45: khams gsum sems can thams cad kyis //
